You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &colone;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Colone;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2a74/index.htm U+02A74].
  * `&colone;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2254/index.htm U+02254].
